note.p: Career: Member of Parliament as John, Viscount Glenorchy, for Okehampton (1820-1826), and as Earl of Ormelie, for Perthshire (1832-1834); Lord Lieutenant, Argyllshire (1839) and Vice Admiral therof (1840-11862); President of the Bristih Association (1840: Rector, University of Glasgow (1840-1842).
Freemason, as John, Viscount Gelnorchy, 56th Grand Master Mason of Scotland, 1824-1826
Library and Museum of Freemasonry, 'Freemasons and the Royal Society: Alphabetical List of Fellows who were Freemasons' 2010, page 16
